attributes.action: I ask for legalizing the use, cultivation, sale/export of medical & recreational
attributes.additional_details:
There's too much to list! 
"Freedom doesn't exist if nature is illegal"
The people

THC - Tetrahydrocannabinol
attributes.background:
Cannabis seized in UK 'worth more than £62m per year'
Police seize on average a quarter of a million cannabis plants with a total street value of more than £62 million a year

It's time to stop wasting money & incriminating people for medicating & wanting a good time. 
0 deaths linked to THC
